Get Ready for Urban Hunting X Grow Up
Martell NCF is partnering with Mercedes-Benz to bring you the biggest party of the year in Malaysia! Grammy award winning, NERVO, lights up the night with a DJ set of their biggest hits. The hunt is on for 150 Martell NCF fans!
Be one of the chosen few.
Registration ends May 23, 2017.
Sign up here <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/MYA_BRD_MRT_1705_Nervo_party_page_registration.html?FirstName={{lead.First Name}}&LastName={{lead.Last Name}}&Email={{lead.Email Address}}]]>* to secure your Martell NC party invites.
*You must be at least 21 y/o and non-Muslim to sign up.
Martell NCF Invades KL
If you can’t join us on May 25, watch out for our upcoming Martell NCF Invasion Parties. High energy venues are scouted by Martell NCF for an exclusive party kicker upper with an all-female DJ crew!
Like our FB page <[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.MY/]]> to start the invasion.
Under the Spell of Slayberry
Time for a DIY Martell NCF cocktail. Easy to mix, but intense on the enjoyment factor, the Slayberry Shot does indeed slay. Try one now!
Add 1 shot of Martell NCF. Then add in 1 shot of strawberry jam with warm water. Lastly, add some ice cubes for a chilled drink.
